pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==========================Welcome to Heat Dashboard!==========================Heat dashboard is a horizon plugin for Heat.* License: Apache license* Documentation: https://docs.openstack.org/heat-dashboard/latest/* Source: https://opendev.org/openstack/heat-dashboard* Bugs: https://storyboard.openstack.org/#!/project/openstack/heat-dashboard* Release Notes: https://docs.openstack.org/releasenotes/heat-dashboardTeam and repository tags------------------------.. image:: https://governance.openstack.org/tc/badges/heat-dashboard.svg :target: https://governance.openstack.org/tc/reference/tags/index.html
